articles.title: Security agencies concerned Taliban takeover in Afghanistan could increase terrorism in Southeast Asia: Shanmugam - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Many security agencies are concerned that the Taliban takeover in Afghanistan could lead to more terrorism in the region, Law and Home Affairs Minister K Shanmugam said on Friday (Sep 10).

articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks nudge higher as Chinese video game stocks bounce back - CNBC
articles.description: In Friday morning trade, shares of Tencent in Hong Kong jumped 2.33% while Netease gained 3.96%, a partial recovery from the heavy losses seen Thursday.
articles.content:
